alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 03 at 10:58AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Guam. * WHEN...Through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. Extensive street flooding and flooding of creeks and rivers are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A surface trough and the circulation passing near the local area will produce a higher chance of showers and thunderstorms into next week. Soil conditions are already saturated, which will allow for runoff to easily commence. The potential for heavy rain will continue through Monday evening, monitor for flash flooding conditions during periods of heavy rain. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
